**Om InvolverMeg**  
Hva er viktig for deg √• snakke om n√•r du kommer til konsultasjon? ¬†

Her f√•r du mulighet til √• fortelle hvilke symptomer du har, og hva du har behov for √• f√• informasjon om. Du kan prioritere hva som er viktigst for deg √• f√• tatt opp i samtale med helsepersonell. Bruk av InvolverMeg kan bidra til at behandleren din kan tilpasse samtalen etter dine behov.

Det tar 3-4 minutter √• fylle ut skjemaet og n√•r du trykker ‚ÄúSend inn‚Äù mottar sykehuset skjemaet ditt og lagrer dette i din journal.

InvolverMeg er utviklet av forskere og helsepersonell i samarbeid med ulike pasientgrupper. Det er et samtaleverkt√∏y som kan bidra til √• fremme pasienters perspektiv og involvering i beslutninger om egen helse.

What is important for you to talk about when you come to your next appointment?

Here you have the opportunity to tell what symptoms and information needs you have, and prioritize what is important to bring up in conversation with healthcare professionals. Using InvolverMeg can help your therapist adapt the conversation to your needs.

The form will first be read in connection with your appointment, and not immediately after you submit it. The form will not be answered.

extension.valueMarkdown:
What is important for you to talk about when you come to your next appointment?

Here you have the opportunity to tell what symptoms and information needs you have, and prioritize what is important to bring up in conversation with healthcare professionals. Using InvolverMeg can help your therapist adapt the conversation to your needs.

The form will first be read in connection with your appointment, and not immediately after you submit it. The form will not be answered.

**What symptoms and information needs do you have?**

On the following pages, you can choose which symptoms and information needs you have by marking what best describes your situation and prioritizing what you want to bring up in conversation.

extension.valueMarkdown:
**About InvolverMeg**  
What is important for you to talk about when you come for a consultation?

Here you have the opportunity to tell what symptoms you have, and what you need to get information about. You can prioritize what is most important for you to discuss in a conversation with a healthcare professional. Using InvolverMeg can help your therapist adapt the conversation to your needs.

It takes 3-4 minutes to fill out the form and when you press ‚ÄúSubmit‚Äù the hospital receives your form and saves it in your medical record.

InvolverMeg was developed by researchers and healthcare professionals in collaboration with various patient groups. It is a conversation tool that can help promote patients' perspectives and involvement in decisions about their own health.
